findings.message:
Fidometa.setMaxTxPercent(uint256) (FidoMeta.sol#675-677) should emit an event for: 
	- _maxTxAmount = _tTotal.mul(maxTxPercent).div(10 ** 2) (FidoMeta.sol#676)
findings.name: events-maths

findings.message:
Fidometa.setCharges(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256) (FidoMeta.sol#555-587) should emit an event for: 
	- _community_charge = community_charge (FidoMeta.sol#582) 
	- _ecoSysFee = ecoSysFee (FidoMeta.sol#583) 
	- _surcharge1 = surcharge1 (FidoMeta.sol#584) 
	- _surcharge2 = surcharge2 (FidoMeta.sol#585) 
	- _surcharge3 = surcharge3 (FidoMeta.sol#586)
findings.name: events-maths

findings.message:
Fidometa.transferWithLock(address,uint256,uint256) (FidoMeta.sol#1036-1059) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(locks[recipient].lockedToken == 0,This address is already in vesting period) (FidoMeta.sol#1043-1046)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:
Fidometa.unlock(address) (FidoMeta.sol#994-1028) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(block.timestamp > startTime + (initialLock * 86400),UnLocking period is not opened) (FidoMeta.sol#1004-1007)
	- remainedMonth > 5 (FidoMeta.sol#1017)
	- require(bool,string)(remainedMonth > 0,Releasable token till now is released) (FidoMeta.sol#1018)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:
Fidometa._tTotal (FidoMeta.sol#328) is set pre-construction with a non-constant function or state variable:
	- 15000000000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals)
findings.name: function-init-state
